app_title: PrimoDoor - Intercom system in your smartphone

ul.1: Unique and protected key cards for object control and security
ul.2: Video intercom in a smartphone (iOS, Android)
ul.3: Convenient access to parking and auxiliary entrances
ul.4: Self-management of the service in a personal online office

text.name: No wires or panels
text.description: It works via the Internet thanks to the application on the phone. No wires and panels in the apartments

text.name: Access from any point
text.description: Opens the door of your entrance from any point - both from the couch and from another country.

text.name: Opening without a key
text.description: You can open the door yourself, you don't need to carry keys.

text.name: Video calls
text.description: You can see who came to you.

first.paragraph: A call panel is installed in the wall of the entrance

second.paragraph: Apartment residents download the PrimoDoor program

third.paragraph: Residents receive personal logins, passwords and connect to the system

form.title: Order a consultation
form.thanks: Thank you for your inquiry. We will contact you soon!
